name: Smoothie Sisters - Windows Build
description:
Chillenium GameJam 2022 - Elbert Hoang, Chris Chuang, Meredyth Yorek, Kelton Chesshire. 

Catch the falling ingredients and mix up a delicious smoothie for your customer! Each one has their own preferences, so make sure to not collect food that they don't like.

Controls - Left/Right or A/D to move the bowl.

Mac Build - https://myorek.itch.io/smoothie-sisters
